resources.string: Doc. Herout came up with the idea of marathons and thus he also build the foundations of our game.
Bachelors (taken care of by vice-dean Křena) are promoted to higher status (\"handled\"by vice-dean Růžička) with the presency of the insignia, often in hands of Mr Juřiček.
Masters (taken care of by vice-dean Růžička) are promoted to higher status (\"handled\"by vice-dean Hruška) with the presency of the insignia, often in hands of Mr Juřiček.
Current dean and ex-dean together represent the function of the Dean.
Researcher who is also the Dean has the power to promote his favourite colleagues to vice-dean posts.
Faculty administrator is authorization on trusteeship by dean.
Vice-dean Zemčík can solve any international problem. Together with doc. Drahanský they can indeed comunicate even with (South?) Corea. Anyway, most of the time you must go to Ing. Studená\'s office.
Average food from school canteen and our cafeteria is enough for you? Then you will definitely love our (closed) restaurant

Both large lecture rooms wouldn\'t be as awesome without the perfectly (not) working streaming and recording system, which allows to watch lectures from the warm dormitory. With beer. And with video running on double speed. And with sound turned off. And you don\'t even have to wear pants! Thanks to Mgr. Skokanová who\'s keeping her eye on these tiny little devices.
Streaming can be used to connect larger lecture room D105 with smaller rooms D0206 and D0207.
Streaming allows to connect room E112 and smaller E104. Before this semester started, we were even able to connect the other smaller room E105. The investigation of the problem still persists.
Video streaming required video servers and communikation between employes of CVT.
Lots of servers. Lots of employers keeping their eyes on them. This is how we run the ComputerW centre.
Invitation from doc. Herout to a cup of cofee inside the beautiful conference room G108 is another kind of offer you can\'t refuse (even Deputy Deans can\'t).
Every Deputy Head of departmen has became Head of departmen in case that he spent much of time with influential people in restaurants.
Every Deputy Head of departmen has became Head of departmen in case that he spent much of time with influential people in restaurants.
Every Deputy Head of departmen has became Head of departmen in case that he spent much of time with influential people in restaurants.
Every Deputy Head of departmen has became Head of departmen in case that he spent much of time with influential people in restaurants.
Vice-dean for Ph.D study and head of DCGM together convinced dozen of Ph.D. students to live in one office.
Prof. Meduna and vice-Dean Hruška cooperating with Petr \"S3rvác\" Zemek.
Professor Meduna uses literature from library and he recites poetry in wine room or basement every semester.
When doc. Herout organized marathons in CVT it\'s surprising that no one student doesn\'t need mortuary for the long term period.
In cafeteria they are coocking excelent waste from butcher.
Doc. Kolář and Dr. Křena together send many students to Student\'s affairs or in worst case to mortuary, every year.
When student can\'t solves his issues at student\'s affairs neither at Mgr. Studená he has to do terminate decision - meet with Ing. Eysselt.
After you discovered all hidden Fituška users nothing can surprise you. Except Chuck Norris.
You have discovored the whole FIT campus! The departement of autonomic computers moved to this place from the Faculty of electrical engineering at Antonínská 1 (today\'s university rectorate)
You have discovered everything in the glass building. It was built in 2006 and it cost 700 milions crowns, including the reconstruction of the monastery.
You have proved your heroic powers by understanding everything about FIT. I guess discovering all of the heads of departements helped you a bit.
The ERASMUS program opened your eyes and mind.
After you searched the whole campus, you realised that it is not easy to be a PhD student.
You have discovered all places where you can get that kind of medicine which can solve all human problems.
You are on the right way. You have collected second Vice-dean.
Underground cellar room. It\'s accesible only by underground corrdor which connect both buildings.
Vice-dean for Bc. education. By the way office A308 contains bed.
The precence of wine wasn\'t prove, yet.
Can\'t see, can\'t hear and I don\'t know.
Vice-dean for research and Ph.D. study.
Deepest lecture room at FIT for 90 students.
Deepest lecture room at FIT for 154 students.
The biggest lecture room at FIT for 300 students.
Works of all kinds from morning till night.
The oldest lecrute room at FIT for 156 students.
Conference room G108 is the prettiest one at FIT. There is a big oval table inside. The ceiling of room is ornamented with baroque vault.
Nobody know anythink about this waste.
After reconstruction in 2012 the server room can established cooling and emergency battery power for computers down to 90kW. It currently contains about 1150 computation cores.
Students and researchers loves that place.

Ph.D student there showing regularly heroic duty. Because of absence of place in this room (only 40m2) they have to live together in the number of 14 people. Secondary solution is that there is a miunderstanding in IS FIT.
Student advisor. Some Czech letters: á, Á, é, É, ě, Ě, í, Í, ó, ú, Ú, ů, Ů, ý, Ý, č, Č, ď, ň, ř, Ř, š, Š, ť, ž, Ž.
You shall not pass without slippers!
From the first of September 2012 is restaurant Old Brewery closed because of unknown reason.

Foods of unchristian quality for unchristian prices. Price of one meal in student\'s canteen is counted with equation C = (c - d + 29) * 1.2 + 0.49 CZK, where c are costs of foodstuffs and d is grant (17,45 CZK).
